ygData.subject: Re: 5th level fighter and thief
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, well I ve never heard of a fighter, but I m guessing your human is a warrior. And as for your rogue (not a thief), he s in Rivervale. There
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, well I've never heard of a fighter, but I'm
guessing your human is a warrior.<br><br>And as for your
rogue (not a thief), he's in Rivervale.<br><br>There is
no secret to making money/leveling quickly, really.
It comes slowly at first, very slowly. Just worry
about getting good experience, getting what equipment
when you can, and learning how each class works in a
group.<br><br>You must realize that this game takes a ton of time.
At this point in the game I have put in almost 40
full days. That's 880 hours to get to the point I am
at.<br><br>Again, try not to rush to get money, loot, or levels.
Just go at your own pace and do your best to have
fun.<br><br>Iskandar
